description: I have Logitech G502 HERO SE mouse and this makes it rock like in win.
summary: Logitech G502 HERO SE and you found it

description: Doesn't detect my HP mouse on Kubuntu 5.24

Have to open Piper after every system boot and set the correct DPI again. Changing mouse speed on the designated mouse speed button on the mouse doesn't work either. Other than that basic features are available for the G502.
steam deck user. no amount of console faffing has solved the issue yet

The offical software for the Logi G600 has turned into iredeemable garbage, but Piper saves the day and make these mice glorious again.
Everything is set-and-forget with Piper. A must-have for me.

Resolution switching or macros don't seem to function on my G502.

I also can't change profiles, as it spits out a non descript error like "Something went wrong. The device has been reset to previous state!"

Other than this, DPI switching and LED control seems fine to me.

I don't know what all the other reviews are on about, claiming they don't know how to get it to work and there's no available guides anywhere. What you need to do is read the easy-to-access guide found at the bottom of this page or at github.com/libratbag/piper/wiki/Installation.
Has more functionality than the app the mouse came with
It stopped working for no apparent reason. I can change the color of the LEDs but not set anything for the buttons. Too bad...
Crashes from time to time when opening the color picker

Works great with my Logitech G403 for setting up multiple onboard profiles, which Logitech's own GHUB software on Windows cannot do properly because of some bugs.

For list of supported devices check https://github.com/libratbag/libratbag/

I have all Logitech equipment, more specifically my mouse is the G600 MMO Gaming Mouse. This app allows me to configure the cursor resolution speed, all the buttons and even control the LED lights. Thank you for making this especially since Logitech won't make a native software app for linux.

I don't understand why this is rated so low. I've been using it for over a year and have tried it with 3 different mice, and so far its been great! It may not be as powerful as Logitechs default offering under Windows, but seeing as I am running Linux only on all systems and it allows ressignment of all my buttons wih support for profiles I am more than happy. Thank you to the developers for this. I'd searched for quite some time and I've been using it since the early alphas.
summary: This app is great for those with Logitech mice!

description: Works perfect with my Logitech G203 and it is easy to use

Thank god this exists, because logitech sucks and doesnt support linux. With this I can actually set my mouse dpi and buttons. 
The guy complaining it doesnt work with his Razer should delete the 1 Star and read the description.

I can almost control everything for my Logitech G903 mouse via GUI.
Exactly how it should be, very useful tool

When I open the application I see only a mouse with error 404.

Correctly detects features of my Logitech G203 gaming mouse and allows controlling all LED modes.

Logitech MX 518 Mouse

description:
On first install, it did not work and messed up the profile on my mouse so the buttons didn't work.

After uninstalling and reinstalling via exact same workflow as first time, worked just fine.

UI isn't the most intuitive.

description: Finally an easy way to map mice buttons! Perfect for Logitech Hero G502!
Kubuntu, 20.04.2 all buttons work, resolution switching and button assignment too!, thank you devs!
summary: Works on a Logitech Hyperion Fury G402!

description: Looked all over for something that could configure my logitech peripherals properly and found nothing, then happened upon this by accident =D

Sado masochism is the only explanation I have for Windows users since changing over to Linux.

I looked for a program from Logitech and nothing, no intention etc. It really meant a lot to have this show up and be discussed by Itsfoss. They've become a real major source for me to get things done in my moving to Linux after a major windows attack on my system about a week ago. I haven't enjoyed computing this much in 20 years. It's the ability to find download and use utilities so quickly in Linux due to good folks who make them that explains Linux is actually easier to use than Windows, you just need to be a little more careful. Honestly this utility needs to be forwarded to Logitech with a note of being available for their suggestion, recommendation, and inclusion in Linux distributions if they see it meets all their requirements and needs (and I'd say for a small fee too).

In less than 5 minutes I had this installed and am able to adjust my mouse for the variety of computer games I play and to also not be too difficult to use in writing and composing. Very well done and I truly thank you
summary: Thank you! Thank you! Thank you for this utility!

description: Work out of the box with the G203

Followed the instructions on libratbag, installed.
Followed the instructions on the piper wiki, installed.

G903 is accessible. 

Thank you.
if you want any solid color or a few affects like breathing and cycle on a G-Pro mouse , this should work just fine for you as well.

the LEDs on my G203 don't do the wave effect anymore and the resolution / pointer speed switch doesn't work anymore either. tried booting into windows and readjusting the mouse settings with the official app, but as soon as i boot back into ubuntu (studio 22.04) the "piper behavior" kicks back in, even when piper in uninstalled.
Simple to use, works great.
Was able to change dpi as well as LED and button layout, amazing app!
Get a "connect connect to ratbagd" error on Steam Deck. Cannot find documentation to get it to work or need permissions?
summary: Can't get Piper to work with Steam Deck

description: Funktioniert. Sehr einfach zu bedienen. Ohne schnickschnack. So wünsche ich mir jede Software.

I can configure my G502 Protheus Spectrum just fine.

Two things could work better:
* If it stays open, it sometimes crashes
* there is no update of the mouse settings. When I change the resolution, it seems to be never updated to the GUI

On the other hand it is lightweight, fast and made without vendor support - GREAT and thanks for your work!
Razer wird nicht unterstützt und von daher absolut sinnlos und unbrauchbar! Der Programmierer lebt in seiner Logitech-Welt.
funktioniert Perfekt
summary: Funktioniert sogar mit Tastaturen und Headsets

description: Ich habe eine Logitech MX Master 3 Maus. Das Programm hat die Maus direkt richtig erfasst. Das Design der App gefällt mir sehr. Ich wünschte ich könnte noch das seitliche Mausrad einstellen.
funktioniert ohne probleme

Por lejos, muchísimo mejor que cualquier utilidad "de fábrica" para Windows. Es muchísimo más sencillo configurar teclas, e incluso tiene compatibilidad con iluminación RGB en los mouse. 10/10
summary: El mejor software para control de mouse

description: Nice and easy. But lacks of the same functions for a keyboard..., and it will be sweet they implement it.

description: Funciona perfecto en logitech g502 hero, pero le falta poder poner opciones de repetición constante o alternar si o no tecla activada sin tener que dejar el dedo pulsado en x boton.

Gère complètement mes souris (G500 et G502) et facile a prendre en main.
Testé sur une Logitech G403, fonctionne pour l'utilisation que j'en ai (remapper le bouton du milieu, modifier la couleur des LEDs)

Fonctionne bien pour ma souris G502 HERO j'ai pu réglé la sensibilité de la souris, programmé mes touches G7 et G8 pour monter / descendre le DPI.

Fonctionne un peu moins bien pour mon clavier G910, on peut configurer l'éclairage mais les touches programmable j'ai pas réussi.

Par contre mon casque G432 est pas du tout reconnu.

Toute les fonctions sont la sauf adapter les couleurs de la souris à celle de l'écran. Meilleur logiciel pour souris logitech pour linux.
Fonctionne très bien pour moi ( logitech g203 )
К великому сожалению, не могу рекомендовать. При первой установке приложение запустилось и даже позволило произвести скудные настройки, но позже после переустановки системы оно не захотело работать.
Единственное приложение, которое смогло переназначить кнопки на G604, а также dpi для каждого режима, весьма качественное, работает

Плохой производитель Лохгитеч не делает ПО для линаги и приходиться страдать, но хотя бы есть это. Минус звезду из-за отсутствия возможности убавлять и прибовлять громкость по нажатию на боковые колеса. Или есть, но я не нашёл. В любом случаи пока что не идеально.
Мышки уже с вагоном кнопок а в системе только стандарт, остальное не работает!
